name: THE World Academic Summit 2024 | Manchester, UK | 7-9 October
content: Join some of the world's most inspiring thought leaders and influential changemakers to explore how higher education, industry and policymakers can work together to ensure that universities can act as drivers of positive change within local, national and international communities. Agenda themes: - The importance of civic responsibility - Driving innovation for the future - Collaboration within and between institutions - Global impact for the common good The event will feature the exclusive reveal of the THE World University Rankings 2025, and an in-depth masterclass from THE's data team. The masterclass will feature detailed analysis and insight into the key findings, trends and stories from the data. Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2552273-2?pid=4868 Time: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM Venue Details: The University of Manchester, Oxford Road, Manchester, England, M13 9PL, United Kingdom Prices: Universities: GBP 1695.00, Corporate: GBP 2299.00
